title: New: Dijon – Stranger
body:
I’ve been a big fan of **Abhi//Dijon** for quite some time now.

Whilst elements of the resoundingly current and forever imitated ‘Jai Paul-wave’ seeps in to their music, they manage to truly carve out their own unique niche, and no less so than on latest single from one half of the duo. _Stranger_ is at heart a pop song, that in truth, feels as indebted to the 80s as it does to anything since. Check it out below.
